COMMAND.name: quit
COMMAND.help: Quit this CLI session

COMMAND.name: top
COMMAND.help: Go back to the main CLI level

COMMAND.name: up
COMMAND.help: Go back to the previous CLI menu level

COMMAND.name: device
COMMAND.help: This object describes a device.

COMMAND.name: interface
COMMAND.help: The list of interfaces which exist on this device. Represents Interface Statistic and Neighbors.

COMMAND.name: stats
COMMAND.help: The Interface Statistic shows counters for sent/received bytes, packets, errors etc.

COMMAND.name: neighbor
COMMAND.help: This feature allow us to see which devices are connected to which interface of another device.

COMMAND.name: multiapcap
COMMAND.help: The Multi-AP capabilities supported by this device

COMMAND.name: device show
COMMAND.help: Show information

PARAM.name: DeviceIndex
PARAM.help: DeviceIndex parameter: number, range ([n-m]) or wildcard(*) - by default

COMMAND.name: device update
COMMAND.help: Update management objects information of the appropriated component

COMMAND.help: Show information
